text: Baca binjirana nawe mw’ibohero bari kumwe n’imisore ibiri, umwe muribo aca avuga ati:- mu vy’ukuri jewe nisanze ndiko ndakanyura urukanywa, n’uwundi nawe avuga ati:- jewe mu vy’ukuri nisanze nikoreye imikate kumutwe wanje, n’inyoni nazo ziyindirako, none n’udusigurire ivyarivyo, mu vy’ukuri twebwe tukubona yuko uri mubantu b’intungane
